name: Ha Long Bay
description:
Immerse yourself in the ethereal beauty of thousands of unique limestone karst islands rising from the emerald waters of Ha Long Bay.

**Top Activities:** 🛶
- Scenic cruises around the bay 🚢.
- Kayaking to explore magnificent caves (Sung Sot Cave, Thien Cung Cave) 🚣.
- Swimming at pristine beaches 🏖️.
- Climbing Bai Tho Mountain for panoramic bay views ⛰️.
- Experiencing an overnight stay on a cruise ship 🌃.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Ha Long grilled squid (Cha muc Ha Long) 🦑.
- Sipunculus nudus (Ngan).
- Geoduck clam (Tu hai).

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Ha Long pearls 🦪.
- Handicrafts made from seashells 🐚.

name: Sa Pa
description:
Sa Pa captivates visitors with its majestic mountain scenery, terraced rice fields winding like silk ribbons, and the unique cultural identities of ethnic minority groups such as the H'Mong, Red Dao, Tay, and Giay.

**Top Activities:** 🚶
- Conquering Fansipan Peak - the 'Roof of Indochina' 🏔️.
- Trekking through Cat Cat and Ta Phin villages 🏞️.
- Exploring Muong Hoa Valley with its mysterious ancient rock carvings 🗿.
- Enjoying the cool climate and admiring the mist-covered mountains 🌫️.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Horse stew (Thang Co).
- Salmon hotpot (Lau ca tam) 🍲.
- Bamboo-tube rice (Com lam).
- Dried buffalo meat (Thit trau gac bep).

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Brocade products 🧶.
- Intricately carved silver jewelry 💍.

name: Hoan Kiem Lake
description:
The heart of Hanoi, Hoan Kiem Lake is not only a beautiful scenic spot but also a historical witness.

**Top Activities:** 🚶
- Strolling around the lake and admiring the Turtle Tower 🚶‍♀️.
- Visiting Ngoc Son Temple ⛩️.
- Exploring The Huc Bridge 🌉.
- Visiting historical and cultural sites around the lake 🏛️.
- Discovering Hanoi's Old Quarter 🏘️.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Pho Hanoi 🍜.
- Bun cha.
- Young green rice flakes (Banh com).

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Traditional handicrafts.
- Dong Ho paintings 🖼️.

name: Phong Nha-Ke Bang National Park
description:
Welcome to the 'Kingdom of Caves,' Phong Nha-Ke Bang National Park, home to one of the most magnificent and largest cave systems in the world.

**Top Activities:** 🚶
- Exploring Son Doong Cave (the world's largest cave) 🏞️.
- Visiting Phong Nha Cave and Tien Son Cave caverns.
- Admiring the stunning stalactites and stalagmites stalactites.
- Discovering the park's diverse ecosystem 🌳.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Filtered tapioca dumplings (Banh bot loc).
- Thick noodle soup (Chao canh).
- Fresh seafood 🦞.

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Handicrafts made from limestone.
- Wild honey 🍯.

name: Tuyen Lam Lake
description:
Nestled amidst the poetic natural scenery of Da Lat, Tuyen Lam Lake resembles a tranquil painting with its clear blue waters surrounded by lush pine hills.

**Top Activities:** 🛶
- Renting a boat for a scenic tour on the lake 🛥️.
- Participating in water sports 🏄.
- Relaxing and enjoying the scenery 🏞️.
- Staying at the lakeside resorts and homestays 🏡.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Da Lat savory pancakes (Banh can Da Lat).
- Ba Toa beef hotpot (Lau bo Ba Toa) 🍲.
- Grilled minced pork sausage (Nem nuong).

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Da Lat jams and preserves 🍓.
- Artichoke tea ☕.
- Wool products 🧣.

name: My Khe Beach
description:
Renowned as one of the most attractive beaches on the planet, My Khe Beach draws visitors with its long stretch of fine white sand, clear blue waters, and shady coconut palms.

**Top Activities:** 🏖️
- Swimming and relaxing on the beach ☀️.
- Participating in water sports (surfing, canoeing) 🏄‍♂️.
- Enjoying fresh seafood at the beachfront restaurants 🦞.
- Watching the sunrise and sunset over the sea 🌅.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Quang noodles (Mi quang) 🍜.
- Savory crepes (Banh xeo).
- Minced meat skewers (Nem lui).

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Non Nuoc marble handicrafts 🗿.
- Dried squid 🦑.
- Nam O fish sauce 🐟.

name: Cat Ba Island
description:
Discover the pristine beauty of Cat Ba Island with its stunning beaches like Cat Co 1, 2, and 3, and the tranquil Lan Ha Bay with hundreds of small limestone islands.

**Top Activities:** 🏝️
- Exploring Cat Ba National Park 🌳.
- Kayaking through the caves in Lan Ha Bay 🛶.
- Hiking to admire panoramic bay views ⛰️.
- Enjoying the fresh air and relaxing on the beaches 🏖️.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Hai Phong vermicelli with crab (Banh da cua) 🦀.
- Fermented pork roll (Nem chua).
- Fresh seafood 🦞.

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Pearl products 🦪.
- Seashell handicrafts 🐚.

name: Ho Chi Minh City
description:
Saigon - Ho Chi Minh City is the most dynamic economic and cultural center of Vietnam, where ancient and modern features blend harmoniously.

**Top Activities:** 🚶
- Exploring historical landmarks (Independence Palace, Notre-Dame Cathedral, Central Post Office) 🏛️.
- Visiting the War Remnants Museum 🖼️.
- Shopping at Ben Thanh Market 🛍️.
- Strolling along Nguyen Hue Walking Street 🚶‍♀️.
- Enjoying street food 🍜.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Saigon baguette sandwich (Banh mi Sai Gon) 🥖.
- Clear rice noodle soup (Hu tieu).
- Broken rice with grilled pork chop (Com tam).

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Handicrafts.
- Lacquer paintings 🎨.

name: Cat Tien National Park
description:
Cat Tien National Park is an important 'green lung' of the Southeast region, with a rich and diverse flora and fauna.

**Top Activities:** 🚶
- Participating in eco-tours to explore the primary forest 🌳.
- Observing rare wild animals 🦌.
- Hiking and cycling through the forest 🚴.
- Boating on the Dong Nai River 🛶.
- Visiting historical and cultural relics within the national park 🗿.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Dishes made from river fish 🐟.
- Sour soup with Giang leaves (Lau la giang) 🍲.

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Wood products 🪵.
- Wild honey 🍯.

name: Ba Be Lake
description:
Ba Be Lake is the largest natural freshwater lake in Vietnam, nestled amidst the majestic limestone mountains of Bac Kan province.

**Top Activities:** 🛶
- Taking a boat trip to admire the lake scenery 🛥️.
- Exploring the mysterious Puong Cave 🏞️.
- Visiting the magnificent Dau Dang Waterfall 🏞️.
- Learning about the culture of the Tay ethnic people living around the lake 🏘️.

**Local Cuisine:** 🍽️
- Smoked sausage (Lap xuong).
- Arrowroot vermicelli (Mien dong).
- Dried bamboo shoots (Mang kho).

**Souvenirs/Local Products:** 🛍️
- Brocade products of the Tay and Dao people 🧶.
